title: ‘Liar’: Trevor Noah Slams Ivanka Trump For Taking White House Job
text:
‘Liar’: Trevor Noah Slams Ivanka Trump For Taking White House Job by Jon Levine | 6:46   
Daily Show host Trevor Noah had some blunt words for President Donald Trump and first daughter Ivanka Trump . The late night host savaged Trump’s decision to officially bring his daughter into his administration and called Ivanka a “liar” for reversing a previous claim that she would stay apolitical. 
“Remember how Donald Trump and Ivanka promised they wouldn’t turn the White House into a mom and pop store?” he asked. “No nepotism. Remember that? Well clearly they don’t.” 
Noah then played a clip of an interview with Ivanka Trump and Leslie Stahl , in which Trump clearly foreclosed any chance of a White House role. 
“People think that you’re going to be part of the administration, Ivanka,” asked Stahl. “Um no, I’m going to be a daughter,” said a smiling Ivanka. 
“And a liar,” quipped Noah, who then detoured into news that former South Korea President Park Geun-hye would be jailed for corruption. 
“Wow, a president impeached, removed from office and thrown in jail. Imagine that,” said Noah, “No, no, seriously, let’s all close our eyes and imagine that”
